product_name: The North Face Starks Triclimate 3-in-1 Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: With a twist of the 3-in-1 design, the Starks Triclimate jacket by The North Face mates an insulated vest over an insulated, waterproof jacket for street-savvy style and all-things-winter versatility. Three different ways to wear the system: wear shell jacket and vest together for maximum protection or wear either piece on its own as weather warrants. HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction of jacket is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Jacket is lightly insulated with Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber insulation to supply stand-alone warmth when wearing the jacket on its own. Powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Zip handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal media pocket; internal goggles pocket. Cinch adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; zip underarm vents let you control airflow and your comfort. Fully adjustable hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit. The North Face Starks Triclimate vest uses 550-fill-power goose down throughout the main vest body and Heatseeker polyester fiber insulation at sides to keep you warm. Vest has zippered handwarmer pockets for convenience when wearing best on its own or over the jacket.
short_description: With a twist of the 3-in-1 design, the Starks Triclimate jacket by The North Face mates an insulated vest over an insulated, waterproof jacket for street-savvy style and all-things-winter versatility.
